title: [管理]Simple Feed and Heal Plugin —— 让我们来对某玩家治疗/恢复饥饿度[1.8-1.11]
author: wenl
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 10:54 编辑 

一、插件功能治疗自己/他人给自己/他人回复饥饿度这是一个简单的插件,只要你有权限就可以治疗/恢复饥饿度二、插件特性 自定义的信息 能够喂养/治愈其他玩家有权限的治疗可定制的权限可定制的前缀三、插件截图没什么好看的,只有一堆英文显示(正在汉化)(原帖也没图)四、插件指令及权限指令权限(配置文件可修改)/heal [player]ulti.heal/ulti.heal.others/feed [player]ulti.feed/ulti.feed.others
说明: /heal [player]:    1,/heal 治疗自己;    2,/heal <player> 治疗<player>,player是玩家名         /feed [player]    1,/feed 治疗自己;    2,/feed <player> 治疗<player>,player是玩家名附：        
/ulti reload  权限:[size=14.6667px]ulti.reload(不可更改)
    1,重载插件的配置五、配置文件原版yml:



config.yml
(617 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)



2017-6-14 13:11 上传
点击文件名下载附件
原版未汉化yml




变量:%target% - 获取目标名称%player% - 获取玩家的名称Prefix: '&d[&5Ultimate&d] '
Nopermissionmessage: '&cYou don''t have permission to execute this command!'
Mustbeaplayer: '&cYou must be a player to execute this command!'
Heal: '&cYou have been healed!'
Feed: '&cYou have been fed'
Healother: '&cYou have healed %target%!'
Feedother: '&cYou have fed %target%'
Healby: '&cYou have been healed by %player%'
Fedby: '&cYou have been fed by %player%'
unknownplayer: '&c%target% is not online!'
Usageheal: '&cUsage: /heal <player>'
Usagefeed: '&cUsage: /feed <player>'
Feedperm: ulti.feed
Healperm: ulti.heal
Feedpermothers: ulti.feed.others
Healpermothers: ulti.heal.others复制代码汉化yml:



config.yml
(913 Bytes, 下载次数: 3)



2017-6-14 13:06 上传
点击文件名下载附件
汉化过的yml




注:汉化文件为U码,请自行转换。复制代码六、下载插件下载后请顺手评分喔，评分加人气不会扣除自己的人气你们的支持是我搬运插件的动力呦https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/simple-feed-and-heal-plugin.32080/download?version=164842



ultimatefeedandheal.jar
